articles.title: DHR Health, City of Brownsville collaborate to upgrade medical services
articles.mainIdea: DHR Health, City of Brownsville collaborate to upgrade medical services
articles.summary: Hospital Management: DHR Health, City of Brownsville collaborate to upgrade medical services. The city will incentivise DHR Health with a $2m grant under the Texas Chapter 380 Grant Agreement.

articles.title: Goldman Sachs and KeyBanc are Bullish on Danaher (DHR)
articles.mainIdea: Goldman Sachs and KeyBanc are Bullish on Danaher (DHR)
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Goldman Sachs and KeyBanc are Bullish on Danaher (DHR). Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR) is one of the 14 Best Large Cap Stocks to Invest In Now. On December 9, Goldman Sachs started covering Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR), giving the stock a Buy rating and setting the price target at $265. The research firm pointed to the company’s strong $6 billion bioprocessing franchise. Despite a currently muted […] Related tickers mentioned: GS.

articles.title: HART CEO gets $350K following citywide pay raises
articles.mainIdea: HART CEO gets $350K following citywide pay raises
articles.summary: The Honolulu Star-Advertiser: HART CEO gets $350K following citywide pay raises. The board of directors for the Honolulu Authority for Rapid Transportation has approved a new 4 % pay raise for Executive Director and CEO Lori Kahikina to continue to oversee completion of the more than $10 billion Skyline project. Kahikina, who received a three-year, $336, 000 annual contract in September 2024, will now be paid $349, 440, following a $13, 440 “salary compensation ...
